text: niyata vasayenma kavurun allahvada ohuge dutayinvada pratiksepa kara dama, allahtada ohuge dutayatada atare venvimak æti kirimata adahas kara, “(dutayingen) samaharekuva visvasa karannemu. samaharekuva pratiksepa karannemu” yayida pavasa, (pratiksepaya, visvasaya adi) meva madhyaye ek margayak æti kirimata adahas karannoda
